headline: Pan-American Life Insurance Group Appoints David J. Turner, Jr. to Board of Directors
summary: NEW ORLEANS, September 03, 2025--Pan-American Life Insurance Group (PALIG), a leading provider of life, accident, and health insurance throughout the Americas, is pleased to announce the appointment of David J. Turner, Jr. to its Board of Directors, effective September 1, 2025.
